# This file is autogenerated
title: createServerSigner
description: Overview of the createServerSigner method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/functions/createServerSigner
---

Creates a SmartAccountSigner using an AlchemyApiKeySignerClient.

## Import

```ts
import { createServerSigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Usage

```ts
const signer = await createApiKeySigner({
  apiKey: {
    privateKey: "private-api-key",
    publicKey: "public-api-key",
  },
  connection: {
    apiKey: "alchemy-api-key",
  },
  userOrgId: "user-org-id",
});

const account = await createModularAccountV2({
  transport,
  signer,
  chain,
});

const client = createAlchemySmartAccountClient({
  account,
  transport,
  chain,
});
```

## Parameters

### params

`CreateApiKeySignerParams`
Parameters including the connection config, api key, and user org ID

## Returns

`Promise<CreateApiKeySignerResponse>`
A promise that resolves to a SmartAccountSigner
